text: Mna, uneva mvele ywe difyo dya wahuwila wa Kilisito ananawo wabanikilwe ni wagosi mwe mp'huga yakwe, aungwa yehe awalele haheina kuwalekela idifyo dya wahuwila dya Kilisito indima iyo, vileke awo wahuwila we difyo dya Kilisito wose wadahe kuwalela wabanikilwe ni wagosi zawe, heweina wambizi wowose.
